about_the_game:
Experience a taste of the enchanting world of DeerBoy and the Light of Eden in this special demo! Step into a vibrant, open-world action-adventure and prepare to prove your worth in a trial that will grant you an audience with the Twin Guardians of this sacred land. These powerful beings are your only hope in battling the encroaching Dark Mist that has corrupted the beautiful sanctuary of Eden, and you are in dire need of their assistance.

This demo offers a unique slice of the full game, dropping you into an area ripe for exploration as you prepare for this important trial. Play as DeerBoy and discover the power of nature as you gather light-infused herbs and plants, craft luminous elixirs, solve clever light-based puzzles, and confront the corrupted creatures lurking within the area. The fate of Eden rests on your shoulders, and this trial is the first step on a long and perilous journey.

The Twin Guardians, ancient and wise, will only grant an audience to those who demonstrate true worthiness.

Demo Content:

This demo showcases a vertical slice of DeerBoy and the Light of Eden, highlighting core gameplay features. We're eager to gather your feedback to help us polish and refine these features as we continue development on the full game.

Download the DeerBoy and the Light of Eden demo today and begin your journey to meet the guardians! Wishlist the full game (TBA) to stay updated on its development and continue DeerBoy’s journey!
